A little bit about me...

I am a Software Engineer / QA Specialist / Community Manager. Currently working as Lead QA at SparkPoint Technologies Inc. and MetaGaming Guild and as Community Manager at Filipino Web3 Community Builders.

With over 5 years of experience in the QA industry and Software Testing (manual and automated) with a good understanding of test planning, test design, test execution, defect reporting, and tracking.

Well-versed in Web3, cryptocurrencies, NFT, DeFi, GameFi, and blockchain technology. Passionate in educating the community and onboarding Web3 people into Web3.

Software Engineer

Unit Tester/Crosschecker

Tools: MS Excel, Cygwin, GAIO, Atlassian Confluence, Hidemaru

Tech Stack: C Language (MISRA C), Visual Basic, C++, JIRA

Responsibilities: Source code review, Source code and specification comparison, Test pattern design and creation, Bug analysis, Q&A creation, Debugging, Crosschecking

Community Manager / Moderator

Admin and Moderation

App: Trello, Discord, Telegram, Twitter

Responsibilities: Answer tickets, chat moderation, community engagement, planning of events, educating the community about web3 and knowledge sharing.

QA Specialist

Lead QA

Tools: Visual Studio Code, Postman, Cypress

Tech Stack: ReactJS, Web3, GitHub, JIRA

Responsibilities: Ensuring the integrity of SparkPoint and MetaGaming Guild's software projects (Exchange, Farms, Pools, Bridge, Launchpad, Airdrop, Wallet, and NFT Game) prior to launching to production.
